                                      String... names)

      • hasAttributes

        public static boolean hasAttributes(Node node,
                                    String... names)
        Returns whether the given XML DOM node contains all of the given attributes.
        Parameters:
        node - the XML node to examine
        names - a variable-length list of attribute names to check
        Returns:
        true if all attributes exist, false if not

      • requireAttributes

        public static void requireAttributes(Node node,
                                     String... names)
        Ensures that the given XML DOM node contains all of the given attributes. Throws an exception if any attribute is not found.
        Parameters:
        node - the XML node to examine
        names - a variable-length list of attribute names to check
        Throws:
        XMLStreamException - if any attribute is not found
